txt.en: Explore the sewers and confront Gárvadach
Explore the sewers and confront Gárvadach (again)
With the heavy Angmarim presence in the sewers, Gárvadach cannot be far.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Lágsaith' skill to call Lágsaith to your side.</rgb>
Many dangerous creatures have called the sewers of Carn Dûm home. Some have remained rumours, nothing more. Others, however, may be of interest to the scattered remnants of the Iron Crown.

Gárvadach has met his demise at the hands of a... giant rat? It seems this \qking of rats\q will not stand for more trespassers!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Lágsaith' skill to call Lágsaith to your side.</rgb>
Gárvadach has been discovered, and he is not happy about this untimely interruption.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Lágsaith' skill to call Lágsaith to your side.</rgb>
Sensing its oncoming defeat, Rádarríg scurries away!
A heavily injured Gárvadach has fled deeper into the sewers.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Lágsaith' skill to call Lágsaith to your side.</rgb>
Pick up the summoning horn and call Lágsaith to your side
Lágsaith has begun her tale.\n\nYou should pick up the summoning horn to call her to your side.
